summary: Treachery, sex and revenge cause Prince Hamlet to descend into madness.

reviews.content:
The story didn't fit with the 1940's setting, having the whole movie contained within one house makes it very awkward whenever a character yells (why can't they hear each other?) Keeping the Shakespearean dialogue in the new setting just feels out of place and very confusing. Hamlet just seems like he's sad & drunk throughout the entirety of the movie, and no one seems to have any character depth. 

I think if the story was adapted to fit the setting rather than just plopped into it, it would be significantly better.
